channel.title: Grant on Playful Explorations Lab

item.title: Jody gets CWG Grant
item.description: Jody was awarded a grant from the Center for Women and Gender (CWG) at USU in April 2017. The $12,959 grant was awarded for a qualitative study involving women in Computer Science (CS) majors in Northern Utah. The study will be funded from July 1, 2017 to June 30, 2018. Jody and Katarina designed this project together as a vehicle for Katarinaâ€™s dissertation study. More about this story on CEHS blog, where it was originally published.
